name: Ant Empires Simulator
description:
Rule your own anthill colony being one of its inhabitants – a simple ant! Explore the thriving wilderness, roam through the forest trying to find something to eat, or fight for the sake of your ant’s empress! Play this awesome Ant Empires Simulator game and dip into the wildlife atmosphere completing various missions and quests!

Ant Empires Simulator features:
• Real anthill colony and its inhabitants
• Small realistic ant as the main hero
• Many colorful skins for your character
• The wide range of amazing missions and quests
• A chance to power your ant up
• Large green 3D forest to explore

Try your new interesting life being a little ant trying to survive in its ant colony and beyond – play Ant Empires Simulator game and have fun!
